aboutMovie: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind, in a thrilling action-packed tale that delves into the psychological battle between order and chaos. As the Joker unleashes a wave of terror across Gotham City, Batman must confront his own limits, pushing himself to the brink in order to save the city he swore to protect.

A high-octane chase through a post-apocalyptic desert where survival is the only rule. Mad Max: Fury Road thrusts viewers into a relentless pursuit filled with roaring engines, explosive action, and larger-than-life characters. In a world where resources are scarce and danger lurks at every turn, Furiosa, a fierce warrior, teams up with the mysterious drifter Max to escape the tyrannical warlord Immortan Joe.
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.
The adventures of a hotel concierge and his protégé.
Two high school friends navigate their final days before college.
A group of friends tries to piece together the events of their wild bachelor party in Las Vegas.
The story of hope and friendship in a prison setting.
A heartwarming story of a man with extraordinary experiences.
The true story of a brilliant but troubled mathematician who struggles with schizophrenia.

movieName: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
aboutMovie: The epic conclusion to the battle for Middle-earth.

movieName: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
aboutMovie: A young wizard begins his magical journey.
Four siblings discover a magical world hidden inside a wardrobe and join the fight against an evil queen.
A touching love story that transcends time, based on the Nicholas Sparks novel.
A classic tale of love and misunderstanding set in Georgian England.
A timeless romance aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
